fever: Fever can be a symptom of many diseases. Please consult a doctor.
vaccine: Vaccines are important for preventing diseases. Make sure you are up-to-date with your vaccinations.
hand_wash: Washing your hands frequently with soap and water is one of the best ways to avoid getting sick.
immunity: A strong immune system helps your body fight off illness. A healthy diet and regular exercise can help boost your immunity.
default: I am sorry, I do not understand. Please ask me about fever, vaccines, hand washing, or immunity.
